name: tm26
effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Causes a quake
that has no effect
on flying foes.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Causes a quake
that has no effect
on flying foes.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An earthquake that
strikes all POKéMON
in battle excluding
the user.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user sets off an earthquake
that hits all the Pokémon in the
battle.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user sets off an earthquake
that hits all the Pokémon in the
battle.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user sets off an earthquake
that hits all the Pokémon in the
battle.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes every Pokémon around it.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes every Pokémon around it.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes every Pokémon around it.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every
Pokémon around it.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every
Pokémon around it.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like
steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user frightens the target with a scary face to
harshly lower its Speed stat.
